properties.areaDesc: Wood, TX; Smith, TX; Upshur, TX
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
the Sabine River Near Hawkins, Texas.
* from Sunday morning until further notice...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 8:45 AM Thursday The stage was 19.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday morning and continue to
rise to near 26.3 feet by Tuesday morning. Additional rises remain
possible thereafter.
* Impact...Minor lowland flooding of boat ramps and pastures.  Move
livestock away from the river to higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded waterways.  Use caution when
walking near flooded riverbanks.  Do not try to wade or swim in
flooded rivers and bayous.

For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website
address into your favorite web browser URL bar:
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv
